Name.question: What is the name of the model?

Link.question: What is the link to access the dataset? The link must contain the dataset. If the dataset is hosted on HuggingFace, use the HF Link.

Params.question: Retrive the number of parameters in billions for each model in the series.

Models.question: Retrive the name and number of parameters in billions of each model compared to the model in the paper.

Datasets.question: Retrive the name of each dataset used for evaluation.

Year.question: Retrive the year of the model.

Venue Title.question: What is the venue title of the published paper?

Venue Name.question: What is the full name of the venue that published the paper?

Authors.question: Who are the authors of the paper?

Affiliations.question: What are the affiliations of the authors?
